text: Upin & Ipin is a Malaysian animated television series created by Les' Copaque Productions. It has a total of more than 500 episodes, making it the longest running Malaysian animated television series in history for more than 15 years. ==Synopsis== Upin and Ipin is a 5-year old boy twins that have an adventure with their companions from Tadika Mesra Kindergarten, including Jarjit, Mei Mei, Susanti, etc. ==See also== *List of programming blocks Category:Animated television series
title: Upin & Ipin
